sys_script_include.description:
Script that is used while translating and saving any ServiceNow Metadata Record (=Application File). Some field-types are supported by the ootb Localization Framework (LF) implementation. If a translation for those fields is requested, this Script Include does a simple passthrough.
The following field types are handled by this script include: - Documentation (sys_documentation): used for Table and Column Labels - Translated {Text|HTML} (sys_translated_text): translations which are bound to a specific record - implemented via passthrough - Translated Field (sys_translated): translations with system-wide effect (table + field specific) - implemented via passthrough - HTML Template (html_template): used e.g. in Service Portal Widgets with inline translations like ${message_key} - Translated JSON (json_translations): used in UI Builder Workspaces (those fields contain actually only a list of sys_ui_message keys)
In addition, there are several records which are Application Files themselves but are composed of non-Application File records: - UI Sections: Section Captions and Annotations - Choice Set: Choices (with dependent value) - Tables and Columns: The label for tables doesn't actually reside on table/column record and needs special handling
sys_script_include.name: MetadataLocalizationProcessor
